sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Englands sorrowe or, A farewell to Essex with a commemoration of the famous liues, and vntimely deaths of many woorthie personages which haue liued in England. By W.H. gent. The contents follow in the next page. W. H., gent. Herbert, William, Sir, 1553?-1593, attributed name.
[76] p.
Printed [by Valentine Simmes] for Henry Rocket, and are to be sold at the long shoppe in the Poultrie vnder the Dyall, London : 1606.
By W. Harbert?--STC. Printer's name from colophon. In verse. Running title reads: Honours epitaphs. First and last leaves blank. Some print show-through; some leaves cropped. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[76] p.
Printed [by Valentine Simmes] for Henry Rocket, and are to be sold at the long shoppe in the Poultrie vnder the Dyall, London : 1606.
By W. Harbert?--STC. Printer's name from colophon. In verse. Running title reads: Honours epitaphs. First and last leaves blank. Some print show-through; some leaves cropped. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
